Account.description: Manage users, groups, permissions, and account settings of your organization with the Account Management module.

Agreements.description: Create and control the lifecycle of agreements (contract templates) with the Agreements Management module.

Catalog.description: View, enroll, test and manage the portfolio of products with the Catalog Management module

Contracts.description: Create and manage contracts with your partners with the Contracts Management module.

Customers.description: View and manage your customers (tier accounts) with the Customers Management module.

Integrations.description: Create and manage API tokens, access information, and other integrations with the Extensions  Management module.

Hubs.description: Register and manage instances of your Commerce Management systems with the Hubs Management module.

Listings.description: Monitor and process the queue of listing requests from your partners with the Listings Management module.

Marketplaces.description: Define and control assignment of Hubs and Accounts to the Marketplaces with the Marketplaces Management module.

Offers.description: Set, manage and update the offers of your products with Offers Management module.

Partners.description: View and manage all your partners and partners' information with the Partners Management module.

Pricing.description: Set, manage, and update the pricing of your products and items with the Pricing Management module.

Products.description: Review, test and manage your products with the Products Management module.

Purchasing.description: Review, test and manage Purchase Orders (POs) with the Purchasing Management module.

Reports.description: Access and manage the generated report files with the Reports Management module.

Tier Config.description: View and manage the tier configuration information in the Settings Management module.

Subscriptions.description: Review, test, and manage subscriptions of products with the Subscriptions Management module.

Usage.description: Manage reporting for the pay-as-you-go products with the Usage Management module.
